description: These textured spring rolls have a surprisingly fresh balance of flavours.
name: Salmon Spring Rolls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g salmon fillet, cooked, no skin or bone and torn
2 medium avocado, peeled, de-seeded and mashed
8 sheets spring roll pastry, thawed if frozen

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a non-stick pan to a medium heat with 1 tablespoon of sesame oil.
Fry all of the ingredients apart from the avocado and cook for 3 minutes.
Remove from the heat and combine with the avocado and place a large spoonful into the centre of a sheet of pastry, fold over the edges and roll tightly.
Brush a baking tray with some sesame oil, place the 8 spring rolls on the baking tray and brush the top with oil.
Bake in the oven for 20 minutes or until starting to crisp, turning halfway and brushing the other side with oil when you turn.
Remove from the oven and serve with a choice of dips/condiments.
